original_title: Chance the Rapper's Magnificent Coloring World
overview: A secret concert that Chance the Rapper filmed in 2017, just after he’d won three Grammys for 2016 record, Coloring Book. The concert was performed in front of a select group of fans in Chance’s hometown of Chicago, and it was intentionally staged and filmed as a movie to be screened in theaters.
tagline: An experiment unlike any other! For the first time ever in theatres!
title: Chance the Rapper's Magnificent Coloring World
